good.message: %s battened down the hatches. +25 credits.
%s plundered a barrel of rum. +50 credits.
%s blew a hole in an enemy ship with a cannon. +50 credits.
%s narrowly steered the ship clear of some rocks. +50 credits.
ARG! %s cut down a man twice their size! +50 credits
%s's flintlock blew the head off a poor sod. +50 credits
%s found where the X marked the spot and uncovered a treasure. +150 credits
While pillaging, %s found some rare jewels. +75 credits
%s sent an enemy to Davy Jones's locker! +50 credits
%s found a replacement peg-leg. +25 credits
%s found a shipment of rations. +25 credits
Well blow me down! %s captured an enemy corsair! +50 credits
Shiver me timbers! %s set fire to an enemy ship! +100 credits
%s found some medical supplies. +25 credits
%s found some medical supplies. +25 credits
%s furled the sails in quick persuit. +25 credits
%s prepared the water barrels for fires. +25 credits
%s hoisted the flag and ordered all hands on deck. +25 credits
%s hoisted the flag and ordered all hands on deck. +25 credits
%s cut the sails of an enemy ship. +50 credits

bad.message: Yarr! %s lost a dishonest duel against the enemy.
The scalliwag %s walked the plank for inciting mutiny.
The fighting on deck caused a collapse underneath, trapping %s.
%s was too sea sick to fight.
%s was knocked out and taken prisoner.
%s was surrounded by the enemy and captured.
The enemy sneaked up on %s and was taken prisoner.
%s was covered in a net, and was unable to break free.
%s drank too much rum before the fight and passed out.
A storm blew %s off the crow's nest and fell to their death.
%s fought hard, but was unable to recover from their wounds due to scurvy.
%s was gutted in a sword fight.
An explosion on board sent pieces of %s flying everywhere.
%s lost his other leg to cannon fire and bled out.
%s drowned in a flooded sealed room.
